string.text:
A large backpack for long journeys with a whole bag full of hooks, knives and other equipment used for skinning and gutting animals and mutants.. Thanks to the weight distribution system, it allows the wearer to carry enough supplies and equipment for a trip, as well as enough guts and glory.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] possession increases number of body parts obtained from mutants

A combat backpack used by the military, often to store additional munitions and medical supplies. Some madman put a whole bag full of hooks, knives and other equipment used for skinning and gutting animals and mutants..
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] possession increases number of body parts obtained from mutants

A tourist's backpack with a lot of storage space. Not very popular owing to its cumbersome size. This one had to be owned by some insane butcher who put a whole bag full of hooks, knives and other equipment used for skinning and gutting animals and mutants..
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] possession increases number of body parts obtained from mutants
